meanings.sent1: The rainy weather made outdoor activities undesirable.
meanings.sent2: The old, torn couch was undesirable to potential buyers.
meanings.sent3: It was quite undesirable to forget your umbrella on a rainy day.
meanings.sent4: The weeds in the garden were like undesirable guests, overstaying their welcome.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rotten eggs was so undesirable that it made everyone leave the room.

meanings.definition: A person or thing considered to be undesirable.
meanings.sent1: The stray cat became an undesirable in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The broken appliance was labeled as an undesirable by the owner.
meanings.sent3: The noisy neighbor's party was an undesirable that kept everyone up all night.
meanings.sent4: The outdated technology was an undesirable in the fast-paced industry.
meanings.sent5: The abandoned building stood as an undesirable reminder of neglect in the town.
